sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) selcnt FROM TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER E WHERE 1=1 AND E.APPOR_STATUS = '102'

SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(A.Total_Driving_Dist), '999,999,999,999,999'),'-') AS TOTAL_VIEW ,NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(A.Auto_Driving_Dist), '999,999,999,999,999'),'-') AS AUTO_VIEW ,NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(A.Nomal_Driving_Dist), '999,999,999,999,999'),'-') AS NOMAL_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_DRIVING A WHERE 1=1
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM TB_WEB_HT_BOARD A
SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(A.FILE_SIZE)/1024/1024/1024,1), '999,999,999,999,990.9') AS FILE_SIZE FROM TB_WEB_HT_APPEND A

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WEB_HT_BOARD A, TB_WEB_HT_BBS B WHERE A.BBS_SEQ = B.BBS_SEQ AND B.BBS_GROUP_SEQ = 2000 AND A.REG_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-7 AND TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-1 ) AS BU, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WEB_HT_DOWNLOAD A WHERE A.REG_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-7 AND TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-1 ) AS BD, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WEB_HT_BOARD A, TB_WEB_HT_BBS B WHERE A.BBS_SEQ = B.BBS_SEQ AND B.BBS_GROUP_SEQ = 2000 AND A.REG_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw') AND TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')+7 ) AS NU, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WEB_HT_DOWNLOAD A WHERE A.REG_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw') AND TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')+7 ) AS ND FROM DUAL

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, REG_ID, UP_CNT FROM (SELECT A.REG_ID, COUNT(A.BBS_SEQ) AS UP_CNT FROM TB_WEB_HT_BOARD A, TB_WEB_HT_BBS B WHERE A.BBS_SEQ = B.BBS_SEQ AND B.BBS_GROUP_SEQ = 2000 AND A.REG_DATE > SYSDATE-7 GROUP BY A.REG_ID ORDER BY UP_CNT DESC)

SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(AUTO_DRIVING_ACC_CNT),0) FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_DAY A WHERE A.STND_DAY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-7, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-1, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AS BU, (SELECT NVL(SUM(NOMAL_DRIVING_ACC_CNT),0) FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_DAY A WHERE A.STND_DAY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-7, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')-1, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AS BD, (SELECT NVL(SUM(AUTO_DRIVING_ACC_CNT),0) FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_DAY A WHERE A.STND_DAY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')+7, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AS NU, (SELECT NVL(SUM(NOMAL_DRIVING_ACC_CNT),0) FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_DAY A WHERE A.STND_DAY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')+7, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AS ND FROM DUAL

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, USER_ID, ACC_CNT FROM (SELECT FN_CT_GET_AGENCY_NAME(A.USER_ID) AS USER_ID, NVL(SUM(A.AUTO_DRIVING_ACC_CNT),0) AS ACC_CNT FROM TB_ST_HT_USER_AUTO_DAY A WHERE A.STND_DAY > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY A.USER_ID ORDER BY ACC_CNT DESC)

SELECT MON.M, NVL(UP.UP_CNT,0) AS UP_CNT, NVL(DN.DN_CNT,0) AS DN_CNT, NVL(AC.ACC_CNT,0) AS ACC_CNT FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -5), LEVEL - 1), 'YYYY-MM') AS M FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -5)) + 1) MON, (SELECT TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM') AS M, SUM(A.B_SEQ) AS UP_CNT FROM TB_WEB_HT_BOARD A, TB_WEB_HT_BBS B WHERE A.BBS_SEQ = B.BBS_SEQ AND B.BBS_GROUP_SEQ = 2000 AND A.REG_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),-5) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM')) UP, (SELECT TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM') AS M, SUM(A.B_SEQ) AS DN_CNT FROM TB_WEB_HT_DOWNLOAD A WHERE A.REG_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),-5) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM')) DN, (SELECT SUBSTR(A.STND_MON,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.STND_MON,5,2) AS M, SUM(AUTO_DRIVING_ACC_CNT) AS ACC_CNT FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_MON A WHERE A.STND_MON > TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),-5),'YYYYMM') GROUP BY A.STND_MON) AC WHERE MON.M = UP.M(+) AND MON.M = DN.M(+) AND MON.M = AC.M(+) ORDER BY MON.M ASC

SELECT A.TABLESPACE_NAME, ((A.TOTBYTES - B.FREEBYTES) / 1024 / 1024) AS USED, (B.FREEBYTES / 1024 / 1024) AS FREE FROM (SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, SUM(BYTES) TOTBYTES, SUM(BLOCKS) TOTBLOCKS FROM DBA_DATA_FILES GROUP BY TABLESPACE_NAME) A, (SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, SUM(BYTES) FREEBYTES, SUM(BLOCKS) FREEBLOCKS FROM DBA_FREE_SPACE GROUP BY TABLESPACE_NAME) B WHERE A.TABLESPACE_NAME = B.TABLESPACE_NAME AND A.TABLESPACE_NAME LIKE '%TS_AVDS%' ORDER BY A.TABLESPACE_NAME
